channel.title: How would I add this warn system to my forum?
channel.description:
Hi,
I'm new to web design, and I have a smf forum working, I'm not sure how to add new things, I wanted to install this:
http://custom.simplemachines.org/mods/index.php?mod=878
I'm not sure what to do?
Could someone please explain how to add that.
Thanks
Musicmad

item.title: How would I add this warn system to my forum?
item.dc:creator: @error.login cane
item.description:
@error.login wrote:

smf mod site, use search function there. Also if you want me to help you just talk to me on msn the.tom@live.co.uk im pretty bored atm just learning css

item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

Thanks,

Do you no where I can get an smf shoutbox that has ban etc, that is compatible with 1.4?

Thanks
